actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to regulate the issuance and trading of municipal bonds and similar securities.

summary.text: Requires the Securities and Exchange Commission to regulate the issuance and trading of municipal bonds and similar securities under the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to regulate the issuance and trading of municipal bonds and similar securities.
